page.title: 08BUSES
page.content: Residents of this area are fairly well served by public transport buses. They could get one of the 14 services and be on the coast at Brighton in 70m monutes or in Eastbourne in 1 hr 35 mins. If they need an aeroplane for holiday or business Gatwick, the country's second international airport is 25 minuts away by bus. If they need to reach Heathrow, London's no 1 international airport Gatwick & Heathrow are linked by bus. Shopping expedition to centres like Tunbridge Wells, Croydon, Crawley or Haywards Heath can all be reached by bus in less than 1 1/2 hours. Other bus routes will take residents to Horsham, Reigate, Edenbridge, Maidstone & Gillingham(Kent) so car less families should find it possible to move around in a 30 mile radius using public buses.
